MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA9 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Bramwell Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:09AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:24AM on 22nd February 2021
